form.official-title: To require a report on the location of C–130 Modular Airborne Firefighting System units.

section.header: Report on the location of C–130 Modular Airborne Firefighting System units
section.text: Not later than September 30, 2016, the Secretary of the Air Force shall submit to Congress a report setting forth an assessment of the locations of C–130 Modular Airborne Firefighting System (MAFFS) units. The report shall include the following:

paragraph.text: A list of the C–130 Modular Airborne Firefighting System units of the Air Force.
The utilization rates of the units listed under paragraph (1).
A future force allocation determination with respect to such units in order to achieve the most efficient use of such units.
An assessment of the feasibility and advisability of modifications to the C–130 Modular Airborne Firefighting System program to enhance firefighting capabilities.
